title: WHY DOES RIOT HATE ME SO MUCH !
body:
Dude i have a fairly decent win rate with cait for my level of play , i just lost in my promos for silver 2, so silver 3 with 100 points and in both of my games there's been a common trend of getting non consistent players in my team . One of them were bronze 1 and the other had informed us that he hasnt played since season 3. I just want to ask, i know im gonna get flamed because im silver but half of the server is silver.
why can they be put in my game and i have struggled to get where i am ? it makes no sense lmao and as i write this ranked ques are disabled  duo to negativity impacting games ..... lol but the damage has already been done, ive never been bronze in any season so why do i have to play with them in my games i can understand if i was silver 5 and get bronzies but when the enemy team consists of golds and high silver why can we get bronzies im nearly a whole tier above them ? {{item:3073}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: you may not bronze 5, but you still have the mmr of a bronze 5 player. Should feel honoured the bronze 1 players are carrying you.
